entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon.
